q: Michael Vick is coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title. "I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football," he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410. that won't run, but if he did he'd be an instant front-runner. President Bush Reagan official Ralph Benko, who ran a website that urged Mr. Mike Pence to seek higher office, tells me: Mike Pence has qualities that inspired unprecedented across-the-board enthusiasm among movement conservatives. I hope that he would accept an offer of the vice presidency from the eventual Republican nominee if called. Other conservative leaders I contacted all reacted with dismay to the Mike Pence news and feared that it moves Mr. Mitt Romney one step closer to the GOP nomination.
